lyrics:
4 contributorsshe and i lyricsshe and i live in our own little world

she and i

oh aint that great
aint it fine
to have a love someone that others cant find

she and i
so wonderful
she and i

she and i share with every body else
the same wants needs and desires

ah but just because we arent often seen separately
people think we live one life
see alabama liveget tickets as low as 58you might also likeits hard for them to see how anyone could be as close as
